Text:
All Sam Fryman's works to Sept 2006 are available at

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3527840/

CORRCTION This work has now been revised,  with a new introduction and available together with all Sam Fryman's works will be kept available on an ongoing basis via the link in the description on torrent

http://thepiratebay.org/tor/3546721/

From 22/12/11 the COMPLETE works will be seeded. I decided to seed it all instead of some individual ones as seeding the whole collection I believe it will allow everyone will be able to get the pdf they are looking for and perhaps check out and keep or delete what they are not. And at the same time keep it all in one organised / easy to search torrent. http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6905797/Sam_Fryman_Complete_Works_Nov_2011_PDF_E-Book
